Hammock.Body: You Awake from your slumber, groggy and disoriented. You look around and see that your on a remote tropical island. You see people in the distance but you are really freaked out and disoriented.

Choices.Text: Run into the forest, and escape?

People.Body: You walk up slowly and the people seem

Forest.Body: You enter the forest and find yourself at a fork in the jungle. Left you see a path towards a mountainous area, to the right you see a path to a large clearing with lots of fruit trees.

Mountain.Body: You walk up to the mountain an struggle as its pretty steep. You eventually reach a hilly meadow where you can see a lot of people next to fishing boats. Some boats are even fishing far out into the ocean just before the reef surrounding the island.

Choices.Text: Go back down to the fork in the road
Run towards the beach where the boats are

Clearing.Body: You look around and give up

Beach.Body: You reach the beach and escape the leopard, you continue sprinting towards a vacant boat
